extendedInfo.description: Beating Art Live Wallpaper HD, with beautiful water ripple effect and floating light particles! This apps is inspired by Sony Xperia backgrounds.Beautiful calming "Water Droplet" effect! Touch or tap the screen to add water drops on your home screen!Everything is 3D rendered in OpenGL 2.0, with fully interactive water that supports multitouch. Both tablets and phones are fully supported in both portrait and landscape modes!Double tap for switching backgrounds!To use: Home -> Menu -> Wallpapers -> Live WallpapersIf you enjoy this, please support us by share this app with your friends! It has access to the app main screen by "Share This App". You can also find more cool live wallpapers (LWP) by "App By Us" option.To develop more free great live wallpapers, we have implemented some ads. Advertisement can support our develop more free great live wallpapers.Disclaimer/TrademarksXperia is a trademark of Sony. This app is not affiliated with or endorsed by Sony.

reviews.title: Very nice and works well on my Samsung note
reviews.comment: Very nice and works well on my Samsung Note.
reviews.author: Satinder Pal Singh
